name: Guschti
description:
33th GM48 (Ranked 30/68) Theme: Collect!

This game was an entry for the 33th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1468/guschti

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Bugs in Jam Version

Don't remove all animals from a stable it will crash the game. You can build a new one and put them in there without a problem, but don't remove them once they're in.

Story

You're in debt! Gather animals to produce resources you can sell. Upgrade your stables to make even more money.

Controls

Drop items by dragging them out of your toolbar

Sell items by dropping them into the truck above the stables

You can Upgrade the stables by clicking on the terminal below them (you need to be infront of the terminal)

Animals react differently to the items you hold in your hand, so try out everything!

WASD  or Arrows Moving Shift Run 1-3 Change which Item you're holding Left Mouse Button Interact with pretty much everything Right Mouse Button Split Items in inventory ALT + Enter  Toggle Fullscreen F1 - F4 Change Windowsize Credits Programming WinuX Graphics SwissPick Audio WinuX Level Design & Story SwissPick & WinuX
